item.title: 意法半导体销售展望因芯片复苏超出预期
item.description: 意法半导体公司（STMicroelectronics NV）作为特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.）和苹果公司（Apple Inc.）的芯片供应商，在去年年底消费电子客户需求显现复苏迹象后，其第一季度营收预测超出分析师预期。【原文：STMicroelectronics NV, a chip supplier for Tesla Inc. and Apple Inc., forecast first-quarter revenue that beat analysts’ estimates after demand from consumer electronics customers showed signs of recovery at the end of last year.】

item.title: 德意志银行计划启动新一轮股票回购，但财报因突袭事件蒙上阴影
item.description: 德意志银行集团以创纪录的年度利润收官，交易收入显著增长，并宣布启动新一轮股票回购计划。该行法兰克福办公室遭突击搜查次日，这一利好消息为首席执行官克里斯蒂安·索伊宁注入了强心剂。【原文：Deutsche Bank AG closed out a record year for profit with higher trading income and announced a new share buyback, in a boost to Chief Executive Officer Christian Sewing a day after a raid on the lender’s Frankfurt offices.】

item.title: 印度黄金进口量将因高价冲击珠宝需求而下降
item.description: 世界黄金协会称，由于金价创下历史新高，作为仅次于中国的全球第二大黄金市场，印度今年黄金进口量预计将下降，珠宝需求受到抑制。【原文：India’s gold imports are expected to fall this year as record prices crimp demand for jewelry in the world’s second-largest bullion market after China, according to the World Gold Council.】

item.title: 北欧联合银行第四季度贷款收入符合预期
item.description: 北欧银行（Nordea Bank Abp）公布的第四季度贷款利润符合市场预期。【原文：Nordea Bank Abp reported fourth-quarter profit from lending that was in line with estimates in the fourth quarter.】

item.title: 中国跨境投资计划收紧，此前需求激增
item.description: 知情人士称，中国已收紧跨境投资计划，限制全球基金经理为内地客户配置资金的范围，此举可能抑制资金流入美国等热门市场。【原文：China has tightened a cross-border investment program to limit where global managers can allocate funds for mainland clients, a move that potentially curbs capital going into popular markets like the US, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国解除制裁后，波斯尼亚塞族重返债券市场
item.description: 据巴尔干半岛国家波黑自治实体财政部长透露，塞族控制的波黑塞族共和国正筹备发行首期欧元债券。此前该地区领导层更迭促使美国解除制裁。【原文：Republika Srpska, the Serb-run half of Bosnia-Herzegovina, is preparing its first eurobond since a change in leadership led to the lifting of US sanctions, according to the finance minister of the Balkan country’s autonomous entity.】

item.title: SEB贷款利润符合预期，手续费抵消低利率影响
item.description: 瑞典银行SEB AB公布的第四季度贷款利润符合预期，因手续费和佣金业务抵消了利率下降的影响。【原文：Swedish lender SEB AB reported profit from lending in the fourth quarter that was in line with estimates as fee and commission business helped offset the impact of lower interest rates.】

item.title: 美元再度下跌，贬值担忧盖过贝森特提振效应
item.description: 美元汇率下跌，终结了周三的反弹势头，因所谓贬值交易的回归盖过了财政部长斯科特·贝森特对强势美元政策的重申。【原文：The dollar fell, halting Wednesday’s bounce, as the return of the so-called debasement trade outweighed Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent’s affirmation of the strong-greenback policy.】

item.title: 爱德万测试日经225权重下调在即，此前股价已上涨15%
item.description: 日本日经225指数可能下调爱德万测试公司的权重，这可能引发被动卖盘，因指数基金将进行权重调整。【原文：A potential cut to Advantest Corp.’s weighting in Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average could drive passive selling as index funds rebalance.】

item.title: SAP预测2026年云收入将实现增长，因客户正转向云服务
item.description: SAP SE预测，随着客户在停止服务旧版客户的截止日期前逐步淘汰旧技术，其云业务收入将在2026年实现增长。【原文：SAP SE forecast cloud revenue will grow in 2026 as customers shift from older technology ahead of a deadline to stop servicing legacy clients.】

item.title: 中国多地下调GDP目标，全国目标或将下调
item.description: 十余个中国省份下调了2026年经济增长目标，这预示着全国经济增长目标可能在四年内首次下调。【原文：Over a dozen Chinese provinces have reduced their economic growth targets for 2026, pointing to a likely downgrade of the national goal for the first time in four years.】

item.title: 英格兰银行考虑出售温网资格赛场地
item.description: 英国央行正计划重启伦敦某体育俱乐部的出售事宜，该俱乐部协助承办年度温布尔登网球锦标赛。此举是央行全面削减成本举措的一部分。【原文：The Bank of England is looking to restart the sale of a London sports club that helps host the annual Wimbledon tennis tournament, amid a wide-ranging push to slash its costs.】

item.title: 克里姆林宫的战争机器将在更严格的预算下踩下刹车
item.description: 俄罗斯国防工业今年将大幅放缓，因为克里姆林宫选择优先保障经济稳定和财政平衡，而非继续增加对乌克兰战争的开支。【原文：Russia’s defense industry is poised to slow sharply this year as the Kremlin opts to prioritize economic stability and balancing finances over further increases in spending on the war in Ukraine.】

item.title: 高盛称必和必拓与CMRG纠纷恐致20亿美元损失
item.description: 高盛集团表示，在中國限制其金伯利铁矿石进口后，必和必拓集团可能面临高达20亿美元的定价压力冲击，因折扣扩大且块矿溢价暴跌。【原文：BHP Group could face up to $2 billion hit from pricing pressures after China restricted its Jimblebar iron ore, as discounts widen and lump premiums collapse, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 韩国称美韩贸易摩擦与Coupang调查无关
item.description: 韩国外交部长表示，特朗普近期威胁对韩国商品加征关税的举动，与针对电商企业Coupang Inc.一起重大数据泄露事件的调查无关。【原文：South Korea’s top diplomat said Donald Trump’s recent threat to raise tariffs on goods from its US ally is not connected to an ongoing investigation into a high-profile data breach at e-commerce company Coupang Inc.】

item.title: 韩元因资金流入和人工智能推动，正迈向13年来最长涨势
item.description: 随着市场对人工智能的热情高涨，以及韩国债券即将被纳入关键债券指数引发资金流入，韩元正迎来13年来最长的升值周期。【原文：The South Korean won is set for its longest winning streak in 13 years as exuberance over artificial intelligence and inflows ahead of a key bond index inclusion buoy the currency.】

item.title: LG能源瞄准数据中心能源需求，因电动汽车前景黯淡
item.description: 韩国电池制造商LG能源解决方案公司正押注人工智能数据中心对储能系统需求的激增，以抵消全球电动汽车需求放缓的影响。【原文：South Korean battery maker LG Energy Solution Ltd. is banking on surging demand from AI data centers for energy storage systems to offset cooling global demand for electric cars.】

item.title: 鲍威尔的生存法则——做个无趣的人
item.description:
美联储真的不需要"动荡时期的诅咒"。

【原文：

The Federal Reserve really doesn’t need the curse of interesting times.

】

item.title: 南非维持或降息的利率决定悬而未决：戴伊指南
item.description: 南非储备银行是否会在周四再次降息，还是维持利率不变以强化其对3%通胀目标的承诺，这一问题引发了不同看法。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank has divided opinion over whether it will cut interest rates again on Thursday or stay on hold to reinforce its commitment to its 3% inflation target.】

item.title: 美光科技任命新任首席执行官，正值人工智能芯片热潮之际
item.description: 日本闪存制造商铠侠控股公司宣布，将任命执行副总裁太田裕夫升任首席执行官兼总裁。此次领导层变动正值该公司致力于在蓬勃发展的存储芯片市场扩大业务版图之际。【原文：Japanese flash memory maker Kioxia Holdings Corp. said it will promote Executive Vice President Hiroo Oota to the roles of chief executive officer and president, changing leadership at a time it’s working to expand its presence in the booming memory chip market.】

item.title: 据消息人士透露，英伟达等公司正就对OpenAI的投资进行谈判
item.description: 据《信息》报道，知情人士透露，英伟达公司、微软公司和亚马逊公司正就向OpenAI投资高达600亿美元进行磋商，此举是新一轮重大融资计划的一部分。【原文：Nvidia Corp., Microsoft Corp. and Amazon.com Inc. are in discussions to invest as much as $60 billion in OpenAI as part of a major new funding round, the Information reported, citing people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 伦敦铜价飙升至历史新高，基本金属延续涨势
item.description: 铜价飙升至历史新高，因基本金属延续了2026年强劲开局，市场预期美国经济增长将更强劲，全球对数据中心、机器人技术和电力基础设施的投资将增加。【原文：Copper jumped to a record, as base metals extended a powerful start to 2026 on expectations for stronger US growth and more global spending on data centers, robotics and power infrastructure.】

item.title: 中国地产股因"三条红线"政策将放宽的报道而大涨
item.description: 中国房地产股大幅上涨，此前有媒体报道称，监管机构不再要求开发商提交旨在遏制其债务积累的关键指标数据。【原文：Chinese property shares rose sharply after a local media report that developers are no longer required by the regulator to submit a key set of metrics designed to rein in their debt buildup.】

item.title: 黄金闪耀光芒，投资者在地缘政治与货币危机中寻求避险
item.description: Tether已成为全球黄金市场的主要参与者之一。【原文：Tether has become one of the biggest players in the global gold market.】

item.title: 金沙股价暴跌，因澳门利润未达预期
item.description: 拉斯维加斯金沙集团旗下子公司金沙中国有限公司周四在香港股市一度暴跌9.8%，创去年四月以来最大跌幅。此前因澳门业务利润低于预期，其母公司美国股票在盘后交易中暴跌10%。【原文：Las Vegas Sands Corp.’s local unit Sands China Ltd. fell as much as 9.8% in Hong Kong on Thursday, the biggest drop since last April, after weaker-than-expected profit in Macau sent the parent’s US shares down 10% in extended trading.】

item.title: 交易员警示日本单方面干预日元汇率的风险
item.description: 在美财政部长斯科特·贝森特对协调行动的前景表示怀疑后，交易员们质疑日本若单独干预以支撑日元，其效果究竟如何。【原文：Traders are questioning how effective Japan could be if it were to intervene alone to support the yen, after US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent cast doubt on the prospect of coordinated action.】

item.title: 印尼首富因MSCI警告损失50亿美元
item.description: 周三，MSCI公司对印尼企业是否真如股价所示具有相应价值提出质疑后，印尼富豪们的财富骤减逾110亿美元。【原文：The fortunes of Indonesia’s richest tycoons plunged by more than $11 billion on Wednesday after MSCI Inc. raised some fundamental questions about whether Indonesian companies are worth as much as their share prices suggest.】

item.title: 菲律宾经济增长率因丑闻骤降至3%；股市下跌
item.description: 菲律宾经济增速放缓至近15年来最低水平（疫情期间除外），公共工程腐败丑闻持续拖累支出及消费者和投资者信心。【原文：The Philippine economy slowed to the weakest pace in nearly 15 years outside of the pandemic, with a public works corruption scandal continuing to weigh on both spending and consumer and investor confidence.】

item.title: 克利尔莱克旗下普瑞蒂姆包装公司申请破产
item.description: 由私募股权公司Clearlake Capital Group控股的Pretium Packaging公司，在与债权人达成协议以重组因多年高额债务而陷入困境的资本结构后，已正式申请破产。【原文：Pretium Packaging, owned by private equity firm Clearlake Capital Group, has filed for bankruptcy after reaching a deal with lenders to overhaul a capital structure strained by years of heavy debt.】

item.title: 韩国将加快首尔住房供应以抑制房价
item.description: 韩国将加快提升首尔大都市圈的住房供给，扩大应对公寓价格持续一年上涨的措施力度。此前出台的多项抑制投机需求的政策未能奏效。【原文：South Korea will accelerate a boost to housing supply in the Greater Seoul area, broadening its response to a yearlong rally in apartment prices after a raft of earlier measures to curb speculative demand proved insufficient.】
